channel.title: Charlie by HAYVN x moemx [future bass'ish]
channel.description:
a piece of art where @HAYVN and me - once more - used the glorious Charlie Chaplin's voice. nobody ever gave us legally rights to, so we just did it anyway :D
enjoy <3
https://soundcloud.com/moemx/charlie-moemx-x-hayvn

item.title: Charlie by HAYVN x moemx [future bass'ish]
item.dc:creator: anon64827621
item.description:
We didn’t. We used Logic. I wish Auxy had a sampler.
